title: HClO4 and KClO4 buffer - buffer equation

content.question: When <math alttext="10 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="0.50 molar N a O H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NaOH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is added to the solution, the <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does not change significantly.
